titles.title: To suspend temporarily the rate of duty on certain leathered footwear for men.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/27/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily suspend the duty on certain leathered footwear for men.
